Ok, KSL has run out of posting time, so his chars are back at their 
bases.

::Cledar/Rixer/Blyer/Forrior::

Cledar watches the Decepticons depart, and then walks over to the bot 
who he assumed was in charge, Iron Raptor. He'd seen some of her 
encounter with Megatron, and knew that she was a Prime.

"Hello, I'm commander Cledar," he says as he approaches her, "Are you 
in charge here?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The battle now over, Rixer walks over to Cledar, looking at Iron 
Raptor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Blyer lands near Cledar, looking what was going on.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Forrior turns and rides after Astroblast, firing several shots at him, 
though he had no hope of catching up.
